mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.tag_name, t.user_id, t.create_time FROM sens_tag t, sens_post_tag_ref r WHERE r.post_id = #{value} AND r.tag_id = t.id

SELECT t.id, t.user_id, t.tag_name, t.create_time, count( * ) count FROM `sens_post_tag_ref`r, `sens_tag` t WHERE t.id = r.tag_id
GROUP BY r.tag_id ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT #{value}

SELECT t.id, t.tag_name, count( r.tag_id ) count FROM ( SELECT id, tag_name FROM sens_tag WHERE user_id = #{userId} ) t LEFT JOIN sens_post_tag_ref r ON r.tag_id = t.id GROUP BY t.id ORDER BY count DESC
SELECT t.id, t.tag_name, t.user_id, t.create_time FROM sens_tag t WHERE t.id NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ( r.tag_id ) FROM sens_post_tag_ref r )
SELECT count( * ) FROM sens_post WHERE to_days( create_time ) = to_days( now( ) );
